edu.kit.cm.kitcampusguide.presentationlayer.viewmodel.translationmodel
Interface TranslationModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
TranslationModelImpl
public interface TranslationModel

This class manages the language and translation for a single user.

Author:
Fred

Method Summary
 String getCurrentLanguage()
          Returns the name of the current language.
 List<String> getLanguages()
          Returns a list of the names of every available language.
 void setCurrentLanguage(String language)
          Sets the current language to the language identified by language.
 String tr(String key)
          Translates the String key in the current language.
 

Method Detail

tr

String tr(String key)
Translates the String key in the current language. If there is no value for key in the current language the corresponding value from the default language will be used. If there is no translation defined in the default language either, key is returned.

Parameters:
key - The key identifying the text to be translated.
Returns:
The text corresponding to key in the current language or the default language or key.

setCurrentLanguage

void setCurrentLanguage(String language)
Sets the current language to the language identified by language. Best used with getLanguages(). Only changes the language if it is available on the system.

Parameters:
language - The String identifying the language.

getCurrentLanguage

String getCurrentLanguage()
Returns the name of the current language.

Returns:
The name of the current language.

getLanguages

List<String> getLanguages()
Returns a list of the names of every available language.

Returns:
A list of the names of every available language.
